text: I am trying to connect #zapier with <#C22PDRW72|data-driven-content> #HubSpot through #webhooks. The process is on Form submission, insert a row in Hubdb with respective data. But my #zap is creating a blank row. No data is been pushed. The image attached is for 'Data Out'. Fields have no value whereas the 'Data In' has values for these fields.
<@U504BHZ6K> I remember you had some similar issues with zap.. Could you share what you did?
sure. I use a custom request in zapier. Here is my example:
Thank you so much <@UG52C29EE>, <@U504BHZ6K>!! I truly appreciate it!! Attached is my work screenshot. Let me know what am I doing wrong.
I tried 'Use a Custom Value (advanced)' for Payload Type but as soon as I save it clears out and gave an error.
There is an option for a custom request instead of using just POST or GET in Zapier Webhook
I just tried your way and worked perfectly.

Thank you so much!!

Sorry, I had another question. Is there a way to pass today's date and page title through this?
